channel.title: auth on xorkevin
channel.description: Recent content in auth on xorkevin

item.title: Auth in a Nutshell: Passwords
item.description: This is Part 2 of my series on how I built the authentication system in Governor and what I learned in the process.

item.title: Auth in a Nutshell: Cryptography
item.description: Authentication is often one of the most complicated portions of an application to design and write, simply due to the breadth of services that depend on it, and the depth of features that it as a service must provide.
